meanings.definition: A person who makes a telephone call.
meanings.sent1: The telephoner dialed the number to talk to a friend.
meanings.sent2: The telephoner called their mom to say goodnight.
meanings.sent3: The telephoner accidentally called the wrong number and had a funny conversation.
meanings.sent4: She was a telephoner, connecting people's voices across long distances.
meanings.sent5: The telephoner always had their phone in hand, ready to chat with anyone.

meanings.sent1: I will telephoner my sister after dinner.
meanings.sent2: He telephonered his boss to discuss the project.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to telephoner by pawing at the phone.
meanings.sent4: She telephonered her best friend for advice on the situation.
meanings.sent5: They telephoner every night before going to bed.
